definitions.definition: Several bird species in the Botaurinae subfamily of the heron family Ardeidae .

main_definition: Several bird species in the Botaurinae subfamily of the heron family Ardeidae .

definitions.definition: The liquor remaining after halite (common salt ) has been harvested from saline water ( brine ).
The saline substance added to soy milk to coagulate it as a primary step in the production of tofu .
A very bitter compound of quassia , cocculus indicus , etc., used by fraudulent brewers in adulterating beer .

main_definition: The liquor remaining after halite (common salt ) has been harvested from saline water ( brine ).
secondary_definitions: The saline substance added to soy milk to coagulate it as a primary step in the production of tofu .
( archaic ) A very bitter compound of quassia , cocculus indicus , etc., used by fraudulent brewers in adulterating beer .
